transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello. Haan. Hello. Hi ma'am, Avinash ji se baat ho jayegi?
Customer: Ah, haan, kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Yeshi baat kar rahi thi ma'am IndiaMART se senior manager.
Customer: Haan, boliye na ma'am.
Executive: Actually, aapne complaint dali thi leads ke liye.
Customer: Ah, yes, haan, haan, humne hi dali thi.
Executive: Achha. To matlab kya problem aa rahi hai ma'am abhi?
Customer: Ah, problem ye aa rahi hai ma'am ki humne spirulina powder aur tablets ke liye kiya tha. Thik hai. To hamara abhi to hame aa rahe hai kaun se lead aa rahe hai? Blue tablet blue powder ke liye aa rahe hai. Moringa powder ke liye aa rahe hai aur alag alag aa rahe hai. Par spirulina powder ke liye bahut kam aa raha hai. Matlab rarely do teen din ke baad ek ek aadha dusra aisa aa raha hai.
Executive: Dekhiye kya ho raha hai na ma'am, main batati hu. Abhi aap onboard hue ho hardly 20 20-22 din hue hai, thik hai? Haan. To ye sab kuch AI based hota hai, thik? Abhi hamara software ye cheez catch nahi kar pa raha hai ki aap kis category mein deal kar rahe ho ya kitne area mein deal kar rahe ho. Abhi aapka jo preference dikha raha hai na, aap settings mein ja ke dekho local dikha raha hai. Local matlab aap sirf apne ye location jo hai. Ma'am, ma'am, ek minute. Aap Avinash sir se hi baat kar lo.
Executive: Haan, batao do.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, bolo. Haan ji sir, actually kya ho raha hai na ki abhi aap 20-22 din pehle hi onboard hue ho, thik hai? Haan. To abhi aapka jo preference hai na, wo set nahi ho pa raha hai. Kyunki abhi jo preference hai wo aapka local dikha raha hai. It means hamare software ke according ki aapko sirf local ki buyleads chahiye. Local mein aapka jo location hai, Y Maharashtra, waha ki leads chahiye. But aap all India deal karte ho.
Customer: All India ka ye kiya hai na maine selection usme.
Executive: Haan, wahi main keh rahi hu. Wo all India ka selection aapne kiya hai. But uske liye na hame preference set karni hoti hai. Preference matlab jaise aap Instagram pe koi reel dekhte ho sir, to agar aap usko like karte ho to related content aate hai. Right? Haan. To same cheez aapko yaha pe bhi karni padegi. Abhi aapko random leads aa rahe honge. Kuch product se related aa rahe honge, kuch nahi aa rahe honge. Wo feedback aap jo aapne feedback waha pe diya hai, uske bajay aap jo feedback yaha se doge na ki ye lead is not relevant hai ya ye lead aapke product se related nahi hai, to shayad jyada fayda hoga.
Customer: Achha, achha, achha.
Executive: Aur aapko filter laga ke check karni padegi cheeze taki aap waha se wo cheez dekh pao ki kaun si relevant hai, kaun si nahi hai. Agar aapko in sab cheezon mein koi doubt hai to ek bari ek kaam karte hai. Ek video meeting main schedule karti hu. Main khud hi aapko sari cheeze guide kar deti hu kaise preference set hoga, kaise aapko leads aayengi. Kyunki aisa nahi hai hamare pass spirulina ki leads nahi hai. Aa rahi hai leads. Bahut sari sold outs bhi hui hai. Main aapko wo bhi dikha dungi ki aayi hai aur sold out ho gayi hai. Matlab dusre buyers ne purchase kar sellers ne purchase kar li us leads ko.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: To wo cheeze main main dikha dungi aur preference kaise banate hai wo bhi main aapko sikha dungi. To aap batao kab hum video meeting pe connect kar payenge?
Customer: Ah, abhi aadhe ghante mein karenge?
Executive: Ah, aadhe ghante mein. To main ek kaam karti hu aapko same number pe call back kar lu?
Customer: Haan, same number pe call back kar lo. Main abhi market mein aaya tha main 10 minute mein ghar mein pahunchunga main. Achha achha. Mera laptop wagera main on karke hai na usme ye karta hu.
Executive: To 11 baje tak karu ya 10:30?
Customer: 11 10:30 10:30 hi karo. 11 ki jarurat nahi.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur mere ko ek cheez batao sir iske alawa koi aur issue, koi aur problem leads ke alawa?
Customer: RM RM abhi tak appoint hua nahi hai.
Executive: Sir hai Adarsh aapke relationship manager hi hai.
Customer: Nahi, humko to koi message nahi hai na. Aur aapki profile se main aapko dikha dungi. Aapke profile pe aa jata hai wo. Main wo bhi aapko dikha dungi ki aap kaise check kar sakte ho kaun hai aapke manager. Wo waha pe aapko dikh jayega. Wo actually relationship manager aap kehte ho but hamare account manager unko kehte hai. To wo aapko waha pe dikh jayenge. Main aapko wo bhi cheez guide kar dungi. Adarsh se to aapki baat hui hogi sir?
Customer: Ah, shayad hui hai.
Executive: Haan, main unki actually main unki senior baat kar rahi hu. To aap mere ko bhi call kar sakte ho in case of any issue. Ah, baki main aapko aadhe ghante mein connect karti hu. Fir main video meeting karke aapko sari cheeze guide kar deti hu dobara se.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you so much. Main 10:30 baje ka meeting schedule kar deti hu.
Customer: Okay, okay, thik hai.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads for spirulina powder.

- RM (Relationship Manager) not yet appointed.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the AI-based system.

- Suggested setting preferences for relevant leads.

- Offered a video meeting to guide through the process.

- Informed about account manager instead of RM.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for 10:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, preference settings, video meeting, account manager
